can you clean up this sentence? I want to talk about the next a b c d parts 
As per this agreement the Second Party will be paid from the project budget / payments for A. design, B. construction oversight, C. license fees for the Second Partyâ€™s patent and D. profit sharing. Payment terms for each of these four sections are detailed below:

Certainly, here's a revised version of your sentence:

"Under this agreement, the Second Party will receive payments from the project budget for the following components: A. Design, B. Construction Oversight, C. Licensing Fees for the Second Party's patent, and D. Profit Sharing. Detailed payment terms for each of these four sections are specified below:"
